CodeBlockMethod.Name: top_cool
CodeBlockMethod.Code: self.top_able = false self.mid_able = false self.bot_able = false self.top_left = self.cooltime if(self.mid_left < 4) then self.mid_left = 4 end if(self.bot_left < 4) then self.bot_left = 4 end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: mid_cool
CodeBlockMethod.Code: self.top_able = false self.mid_able = false self.bot_able = false self.mid_left = self.cooltime if(self.top_left < 4) then self.top_left = 4 end if(self.bot_left < 4) then self.bot_left = 4 end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: bot_cool
CodeBlockMethod.Code: self.top_able = false self.mid_able = false self.bot_able = false self.bot_left = self.cooltime if(self.mid_left < 3) then self.mid_left = 3 end if(self.top_left < 3) then self.top_left = 3 end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnUpdate
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if(self.top_left > 0 ) then self.top_left = self.top_left - delta self:SummonCoolUI_top(self.top_left) if(self.top_left <= 0)then self.top_able = true self:top_UI_clear() end end if(self.mid_left > 0 ) then self.mid_left = self.mid_left - delta self:SummonCoolUI_mid(self.mid_left) if(self.mid_left <= 0)then self.mid_able = true self:mid_UI_clear() end end if(self.bot_left > 0 ) then self.bot_left = self.bot_left - delta self:SummonCoolUI_bot(self.bot_left) if(self.bot_left <= 0)then self.bot_able = true self:bot_UI_clear() end end

CodeBlockMethod.Name: SummonCoolUI_top
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if(self.Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end local cooltime = math.floor(cool) self.topcool_UI.TextComponent.Text = string.format("%d s",cooltime) self.topcool_UI.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = Color.gray

CodeBlockMethod.Name: SummonCoolUI_mid
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if(self.Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end local cooltime = math.floor(cool) self.midcool_UI.TextComponent.Text = string.format("%d s",cooltime) self.midcool_UI.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = Color.gray

CodeBlockMethod.Name: SummonCoolUI_bot
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if(self.Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end local cooltime = math.floor(cool) self.botcool_UI.TextComponent.Text = string.format("%d s",cooltime) self.botcool_UI.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = Color.gray

CodeBlockMethod.Name: top_UI_clear
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if(self.Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end self.topcool_UI.TextComponent.Text = "" self.topcool_UI.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = Color.clear

CodeBlockMethod.Name: mid_UI_clear
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if(self.Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end self.midcool_UI.TextComponent.Text = "" self.midcool_UI.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = Color.clear

CodeBlockMethod.Name: bot_UI_clear
CodeBlockMethod.Code: if(self.Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end self.botcool_UI.TextComponent.Text = "" self.botcool_UI.SpriteGUIRendererComponent.Color = Color.clear

CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Name: HandleKeyDownEvent
CodeBlockEntityEventHandler.Code: -- Parameters local key = event.key -------------------------------------------------------- if(self.Entity ~= _UserService.LocalPlayer) then return end if(self.summonUI.Enable == false) then return end if(self.E.MonsterSponConpoment_L.is_Near and self.E.MonsterSponConpoment_L.is_left == self.Entity.Common.is_left) then if self.Entity.Common.is_left == true then if (key == KeyboardKey.Q and self.top_able) then self.summonUI.Enable = false self:top_cool() self.E.MonsterSponConpoment_L:SpawnTop_L(math.floor(self.lv)) elseif (key == KeyboardKey.W and self.mid_able) then self.summonUI.Enable = false self:mid_cool() self.E.MonsterSponConpoment_L:SpawnMid_L(math.floor(self.lv)) elseif (key == KeyboardKey.E and self.bot_able) then self.summonUI.Enable = false self:bot_cool() self.E.MonsterSponConpoment_L:SpawnBot_L(math.floor(self.lv)) end elseif self.Entity.Common.is_left == false then if (key == KeyboardKey.Q and self.top_able) then self.summonUI.Enable = false self:top_cool() self.E.MonsterSponConpoment_L:SpawnTop_R(math.floor(self.lv)) elseif (key == KeyboardKey.W and self.mid_able) then self.summonUI.Enable = false self:mid_cool() self.E.MonsterSponConpoment_L:SpawnMid_R(math.floor(self.lv)) elseif (key == KeyboardKey.E and self.bot_able) then self.summonUI.Enable = false self:bot_cool() self.E.MonsterSponConpoment_L:SpawnBot_R(math.floor(self.lv)) end end end
